CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(RT_Strategy__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(RT_Strategy__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(RT_Impact__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(RT_Impact__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(RT_Partners__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(RT_Partners__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(RT_Scalability__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(RT_Scalability__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(RT_80_20__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(RT_80_20__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(FT_Strategy__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(FT_Strategy__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(FT_Impact__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(FT_Impact__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(FT_Partners__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(FT_Partners__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(FT_Scalability__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(FT_Scalability__c))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(FT_80_20__c, ""), 0, VALUE(TEXT(FT_80_20__c)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Combined Review Team and Field Team Score.
CustomField.label: Total Score
